trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of time to wait for the entire cluster to stabilize after a fault iteration before failing the test.
trans-unit.target: The maximum amount of time to wait for the entire cluster to stabilize after a fault iteration before failing the test.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of concurrent faults induced per iteration with the lowest being 1.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of concurrent faults induced per iteration with the lowest being 1.

trans-unit.source: The higer the concurrency the more aggressive the failovers thus inducing more complex series of failures to uncover bugs.
trans-unit.target: The higer the concurrency the more aggressive the failovers thus inducing more complex series of failures to uncover bugs.

trans-unit.source: using 2 or 3 for this is recommended.
trans-unit.target: using 2 or 3 for this is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the MovePrimary and MoveSecondary faults.
trans-unit.target: Enables or disables the MovePrimary and MoveSecondary faults.
